title: grass_cutting_back_farm_zone
summary: Grass cutting at the back zone of MaMeeFarm to maintain access and farm boundaries.
description: This data unit records grass cutting activity at the back zone of MaMeeFarm. The cleared area is approximately 2 meters wide and 45 meters long, supporting farm maintenance, access, and waterway management under limited resources.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
